text:
@EricTrump It's been 55 days since the @WhiteHouse has held a #coronavirus press conference/pep rally in the midst of a global pandemic.

It's not enough that your Pop doesn't want to govern, he's completely incapable of it.

If he can't make a buck, he don't give a fuck.

#FixedItForYou
